item.content:encoded:
Price: $23.50
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:05:37 UTC – Details)



UNIVERSAL FIT KIT – A total of 620pcs push rivets including 16 most popular car clip fastener kits, suitable for OEM replacement of 6-10mm hole size. Don’t worry about lost or damaged body fasteners. All the necessary retainers for exact replacement of the old and broken retainer.
IMPACT RESISTANT CAR CLIPS – It’s made of durable nylon fiber material, not easy to break or deform. Excellent workmanship is necessary to condition for product reliability, stability, and long-term use, We check the products again before shipping for you.
TOUGH FASTENER REMOVER TOOLS – 1 Fastener remover and 4 different size car panel removers made of Durable Plastic and Metal material, allow you to quickly and easily remove car door panels and upholstery clips without causing damage to them. Easy access into confined areas.
EASY TO USE – Push in type, Just fix it to its mounting point and you’re done, Rivet post pressure expands legs for fast and tight fastening. Simple to install without complicated installation steps. Widely used in car panel, door trim, bumper and fender for GM Ford Toyota Honda Chrysler etc.
PACKAGE LIST – The auto body clip kit includes 620 Pcs bumper retainer clips, 1 plastic box, 5 durable fastener removal tools, 10 plastic cable ties. It allows to freely DIY your vehicle accessories at anytime you wanted. It is definitely cheaper than going to the auto parts store.

if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Constant improvement and innovation is our eternal aim. Hope you can purchase with satisfaction here. Specification: Universal fastener clips and remover 4 Whole sizes from 6.4 Mm (1/4″), 8mm (5/16”), 9mm (23/64”), 10mm (25/64”). 6 different Push pin rivet for many brand vehicles. Material: Made of durable nylon. Suitable for car use better replacement for original bumper and fender clips. Push in type, easy to fasten bumper fender flare and mud flap. Rivet post pressure expands legs for fast and tight fastening. Features Tough Fastener Removal Tool Allow you to quickly and easily remove car door panel and upholstery clips without causing damage to them. Multiple Application Locations A must have for any four wheeler owner to keep those fenders and splash guards attached and intact. Removable and Reusable Holds securely but is easily removed without damaging it for reuse. Just pop the post out with a fastener remover. Size: 120Pcs Car Retainer Clips plus Fastener Remover Specification: material: black nylon, suitable for car Use better replacement for original old worn broken one. Push type, easy to fasten.
4 Hole sizes from 6.3Mm(1/4″), 8mm(5/16″ ), 9mm(23/64″ ), 10mm(25/64″ ).
6 different Push pin rivet for many brand vehicles.
Great material – these bumper clips are made of high-quality Black nylon Material, anti-wear and anti-corrosion, would not break or crack easily during use.
Widely application – these Push clips are widely used for trim panel clips, door trim clips, door Panel clips, bumper clips, fender clips, engine cover and splash shield retainers replacement. Product Description

Great For Garden Use

For gardeners, plants and vegetables are very important to them.

Especially during bad weather with strong wind and snow, you should need garden fabric (such as row cover or plant cover, or shade cloth), but the good garden clips are also a necessary part of your garden, they can fix the garden fabric in place to extend the growing season.

Beside garden clips, they also can be great food bag closure clips, clothespins, binder clips, photo clips, beach towel clips, etc.

We are sure they will become ideal accessories for you.

About Samhopo

Samhopo means “hopes”, which is also the name of a remote village.

The founder is coming from this very poor and backward place. She is eager to do something to help the people get out of there and have a better life, so there is “Samhopo”

The purpose of the brand is to sell affordable products all around the world to help people live more conveniently.

Large Open Heavy Duty Greenhouse Clips

Feature

Material: stainless steel（Note: the spring part is not stainless steel.）

Length:approx. 2 inch

Width: approx. 1.1 inch

Single clip weight: approx. 0.2 ounce

Package includes:40 x Greenhouse Clips

Have a strong grip Good spring action Sturdy and durable. Smooth edges Easy to Use

MULTI-USE Garden Clips

They will be helpful to anyone who wants them for garden use

Suitable for many hoops of different thickness.

Diameter in closed state approx 3/8”

Maximum diameter in open state approx 3/4”

can be adapted to many different sizes of poles,hoops,stands or pipes.

Why choose our Greenhouse Clamps

Note

Please be concerned about the size before you buy.

Please allow slight size errors due to manual measurement.

Sise

Package

Diameter
3/8”-3/4” 1/2”-5/4” 3/8”-3/4” 3/8”-3/4” 1/2”-5/4”

Material
Stainless steel (spring not included) 100% Stainless steel Stainless steel (spring not included) Stainless steel (spring not included) 100% Stainless steel

GOOD SPRING ACTION: Samhopo garden clips has a thick spring, which has good spring action and can be adapted to most different sizes of garden hoops, stands, pipe or poles. Easy to open and strong. These greenhouse clamps have a strong grip and will not disintegrate like plastic.
MULTI-USE PRODUCT: These greenhouse clips are strong enough to hold down the netting on your raised garden beds or row cover on your garden hoops when it’s a windy day. They will be helpful to anyone who wants them for garden use. Aside from garden use, they make great food bag closure clips, clothespins, binder clips, photo clips, cord clips for hanging up string lights, etc.
SUITABLE FOR MANY HOOPS OF DIFFERENT THICKNESSES: These garden clips have good spring action and strong grip, Diameter in closed state approx 0.36 inches, Maximum diameter in open state approx 0.8 inches, Can be adapted to many different sizes of greenhouse hoops, poles, pipe or stands.
DURABLE MATERIAL: These greenhouse clamps are made of stainless steel(Note: The spring part is not stainless steel), sturdy and durable. They are more durable than wood clips or plastic clips. The clips snapped on easily and held the frost blankets and greenhouse cover in place through high winds and heavy snow.
PACKAGE INCLUDES: 40pcs stainless steel greenhouse clips. Size of the clamp: Length approx. 2 inches, Width approx. 1.1 inches, Single clip weight 0.2 ounce. Please be concerned about the size before you buy.

DURABLE MATERIA:The trim removal tools and Half of the auto clips are made of dueable nylon material,it is can use for a long time.Duty construction for durabilitywould not break or crack easily during use.
WIDELY USEFUL:The auto push clips are widely used for door panel, door trim clips, bumper clips,interior accessories and splash shield retainers replacement.All the necessary retainers for exact replacement of old and broken retainer.
100% SATISFACTION:If you are not satisfied with our car body clips and trim removal tools,please contact us,we will try our best to solve your problem.

【 WORKS FOR ALMOST ALL SITUATIONS】- The kit contains 19 types of most common sizes of fastener clips, cover 6mm to 10mm hole sizes replacement for Ford, GM, Chrysler, Toyota, Nissan, Mazda, Jeep, 2001 MR2 Spyder, 06 350z，1996 Ford F-250, motorcycles, Honda , Chevy Silverado. But NOT ONLY for these cars, if the sizes and shape meet your needs well, it’s also a useful kit.
【 IMPACT RESISTANT PUSH RIVETS】 – Well made of durable Nylon plastic, not easy to break or crack like other brands, it is super sturdy!
【 PREFECT FOR WHAT YOU NEED 】- Up to 425 pieces of retainer clips in a plastic box, allows to freely DIY your vehicle accessories at anytime you wanted.
【 BONUS FASTENER REMOVER】 – Allow you to quickly and easily remove car door panel and upholstery clips without causing damage to them. Easy access into confined areas.
【 WIDELY APPLICATION】- Theses push clips are widely used for trim panel clips, door trim clips, door panel clips, bumper clips, Fender clips, engine cover and splash shield retainers replacement. It always covers some applications include telecom equipment, motor vehicles, domestic appliances, furniture and electrical equipment.

Product Description

Item Package Quantity
3 Pcs 3 Pcs 3 Pcs 20 Pcs 16 Pcs

The Cable Clips are made of 100% silicone, which is non-toxic, non-magnetic, anti-static, and flexible. Once you insert the cable into a slot, it won’t fall out easy at all.
Suitable for holding cables less than 6mm such as computer cables, audio cables, USB charging cables, and network cables.
The double-faced adhesive is very firm and long-lasting and works well in smooth and clean the surface, such as marble, plastic, wood, glass, metal, and rubber.
No more fumbling around on the floor between the sofa and the end table, or between the bed and the nightstand to find the ends of your charging cables.
